title: leveling champions
body: I've been stuck on lvl 5 annie for quite some time now. I'm pretty sure I've gotten the appropriate amount of tokens to advance her lvl. Do you have to manually combine the grades (s- s s+) to enable further advancement somewhere?

replies.body:
Yup, as *Zombiemaster* mentioned, you'll want to combine the 2 mastery tokens for Annie and utilize 500 champion essence in order to upgrade to level 6 mastery for her.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Yes. To advance to mastery level 6, you need to go to your Hextech Inventory in the client and combine 2 mastery level 6 tokens with either an Annie champion shard/permanent or 500 blue essence.

For more information on champion mastery levels 6 & 7, you can check out this guide.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q5
